name: Young Brass Dragon (Metallic)
description: A large dragon with warm, gleaming metallic scales, known for its friendly demeanor and playfulness.
memorable: Has breath weapons that can deal fire damage or induce sleep, along with a unique ability to suffocate foes.
goals: Collects stories, converses with travelers, defends its hoard when threatened.
relations: Might be found alongside other dragons or magical creatures in its territory.
environment: Typically found in arid deserts or savannas.
strengths: Fire immunity and self-sufficient, needing only a quart of water and a pound of food per day.
weaknesses: Lacks strategic intelligence compared to other dragons.
attacks: Multiattack includes a powerful bite and two claw attacks, with an option for sleep-inducing breath weapon.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath and Sleep Breath can drastically change the outcome of encounters.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 30 feet, and has keen senses which enhance its perception.
skills: Excels in arcana, history, nature, and perception, making it knowledgeable and aware.
additional_information: Can communicate effectively due to high Charisma.
Uses its powers for persuasion and social interactions.
Can change shape into a Beast or Humanoid form.
An adept spellcaster with innate abilities.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like 'comprehend languages' without material components.
